titleStmt.title: The Case of the Jevves stated: Or, The Jewes synagogue opened. With their preparations in the morning before they go thither, and their doings at night when they come home: Their practices in their synagogues and some select actings of theirs in England, upon record.
titleStmt.author: Prynne, William, 1600-1669.

notesStmt.note: Authorship uncertain; has been attributed to William Prynne.
Reproduction of original in the California State Library, Sutro Branch.
